markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Ember Fox](/Monsters.aspx?ID=655)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Ember foxes resemble their canid namesakes, save for the flames that make their fur and the tips of their long whiskers flicker and glow.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/ElementalFire_EmberFox.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Ember Fox](/Monsters.aspx?ID=655)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=57" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 110 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Ignan](/Languages.aspx?ID=18); can't speak any language

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** -2

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 35

**Immunities**
bleed, fire, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145)

**Weaknesses**
cold 5

**Cloak in Embers** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** An adjacent ally is targeted by an effect that deals fire damage; **Effect** The ember fox drapes itself across its ally, granting the ally fire resistance 10 against the incoming attack.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 piercing plus 1d4 [persistent fire](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-43" />
name: Ember Fox
